category.name: Integration.Configuring CAE
category.category_description: No description available for this category.

preference.name: CAE_tool_configuration_unix_temp_location
preference.preference_description: Defines the system temporary location used by Simulation Process Management during tool launch on Unix systems. Valid Values: Any valid Unix directory path. Note: This preference is used when a "Local" launch is performed and the Default Scratch Location inside Simulation Tool Configuration view is not provided. In Active Workspace, it is ignored for "Server" and "Remote" launches.
